page.title: 18 SERVICES/AMENITIES WEST ROW
page.content: A CAR IS ESSENTIAL,A FACT GENERALLY AGREED BY PEOPLE LIVING IN THIS AREA. BUSES ARE FEW, CERTAINLY NOT DAILY, AND INCONVENIENT, SO THAT ONE CAN BE STRANDED FOR HOURS IN THE TOWN WHILE WAITING FOR A RETURNING BUS. VISITS TO DOCTORS AND DENTISTS MEAN A TRIP INTO MILDENHALL,BURY ST. EDMUNDS OR NEWMARKET.THE SAME GOES FOR CINEMAS, THEATRES, EDUCATION AND SPORTS CENTRES. WEST ROW HAS NO BUTCHER SO HOUSEWIVES GENERALLY SHOP IN TOWN SUPERMARKETS. THERE IS A POST-OFFICE, IRONICALLY LICENCED TO ISSUE EVERYTHING BUT NOT A CAR TAX! THE LIBRARY VAN VISITS ONCE A FORTNIGHT. WEST ROW PROUDLY BOASTS A WELL-ORGANISED PLAYING FIELDS ASSOCIAT- ION PROVIDING IN THE VILLAGE -FOOTBALL, TENNIS,INDOOR BOWLS,AND PLAY AREAS. THERE ARE VARIOUS CHURCH AND CHAPEL GROUPS,A YOUTH CLUB, A W.I. AND OF COURSE, THERE IS THE SPEEDWAY!
